Rare variant: Increase the maximum charges to 15, the additional piercing damage of Spikes to 1d4, and the DC to 15. Increase Mucous Spit’s attack modifier to +7 and acid damage to 3d6. Increase Splashing Mucous’ acid damage to 2d4 You gain a new way to enhance Mucous Spit: Parasitic Mucous You can only enhance the mucous using one option at a time.

  • Parasitic Mucous (2 Charges): Parasites with the potential to poison infest the mucous On a hit, the target must succeed on a [[/save 15 con format=long]] or be infected with a parasite and become &reference[poisoned]{poisoned} While poisoned, the creature can’t regain hit points. An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

Very rare variant: Increase the maximum charges to 20, the additional piercing damage of Spikes to 2d4, and the DC to 16 Increase Mucous Spit’s attack modifier to +8, and acid damage to 4d6. Increase Splashing Mucous’ acid damage to 3d4. You gain new ways to enhance Mucous Spit: Parasitic Mucous and Infectious Mucous You can only enhance the mucous using one option at a time

  • Infectious Mucous (4 Charges): An infectious disease pervades the mucous. On a hit, the target must succeed on a [[/save 16 con format=long]] or be infected and &reference[poisoned]{poisoned} as if by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.CjIq8Ed7bu3vVwT1]{Contagion} spell. Roll a [[/r d6]] to determine contagion's disease at random.
